cause.description:
Each and every day millions of people walk by , down and through trash covered streets, beaches and neighbourhoods . If each of us stopped and picked up as little as 2 peices of trash a day our world would be a better place. WE CAN DO IT !
1. ITS IN THE BIBLE , THOSE WHO RUIN THE EARTH WILL THEY THEMSELVES BE RUINED
2. OUR CHILDREN WILL HAVE TO LIVE IN A DISGUSTING WORLD FILLED WITH LITTER
3. OUR ENVIROMENT IS SUFFERING BECAUSE OF OUR LAZINESS
4. WE WILL FEEL AS THOUGH WE ACCOMPLISHED SOMETHING WITH INSTANT GRADIFICATIONS
5. WE WILL SEE A DIFFERENCE AND APPRECIATE THE CHANGE
cause.name: PICK IT UP !
